storyInfo: Stitch finally confronts himself as the Durins decide Zeruertza's future. They will head to the surface and begin a new life there.

attributes.content: Eh, now that you mention it, this is starting to ring a bell.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: A few years ago, I participated in a couple Dome design contests with him and Catch.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: Master Finch had just left not too long before that, and our rising new stars both wanted to prove themselves with their Dome renovation plans.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: Catch was an incessant one at the meetings. He kept selling his ideas and the advantages of his design.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: As for Stitch, all he ever did was lay his designs on the table before standing aside. It seemed kind of like he would rather we see his ideas for ourselves instead of wasting his energy to explain them.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: Some preferred Catch's detailed way of thinking, while others acknowledged Stitch's confidence, even egotism toward his own work. Both of them were undoubtedly rising stars.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: This rivalry continued for several years, and neither of them was able to truly obtain the recognition of the majority and get his designs passed.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: Until one day... when Stitch stopped showing up.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: Finch actually brought it up to me before back when he was still around. He told me he was worried about his student's future.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: But those problems you can fix by talking sense into him. He has to think things through himself and set his ego aside. Only then will he hear another opinion.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: Otherwise, forget Catch. Not even someone as strong as Gavial could do anything about him.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: Not even if Gavial really wanted to help him from the bottom of her heart?
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: If there was a way around it, Finch would've tried it a long time ago.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: But... who knows? Catch and Gavial couldn't be more different, personality-wise. If the two of them tried to help him together, a miracle might just happen.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: *sigh*, these are Zumama's friends. It's such a pain when I can't just wreck them.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Hmm? Okay, you guys know Zumama, right? I'm her friend.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Zumama... Confirming identity. Zumama's friend: Gavial.
attributes.name: Strange Machine

attributes.content: Zumama told us we can't hurt Gavial.
attributes.name: Strange Machine

attributes.content: We won't hurt Gavial.
attributes.name: Strange Machine

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Haha, I saw you guys chumming together and thought you were really hitting it off. Didn't expect mentioning her name to actually do anything.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Gah!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Help me surround him, won't you?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: We cannot allow Zeruertza's citizens come to harm.
attributes.name: Strange Machine

attributes.content: Relax, I'm just taking him where he should be.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Understood. We trust Gavial. We will help Gavial.
attributes.name: Strange Machine

attributes.content: Out of my way!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Stitch Canvas, I've got something to ask you.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I have nothing more to say to you!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: You've said plenty, but in the end, do you hate the people of Zeruertza?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: No, you don't have to answer.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: If you hated them, then you should've stayed on the surface after you made it there. You could've hid the danger your tribe is facing.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: But you told us anyway.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: You didn't want to fix the Dome, but you couldn't give this place up. That's why you brought Tomimi and Inam down here.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Yeah, so what?
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: I'm just curious.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Have you ever talked to the ones who voted against you and asked them why they didn't like your proposal?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: No... I haven't.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Yeah, I thought so. Just like you definitely haven't ever told anyone the stuff you just said.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: And actually, you still haven't told me how you truly feel.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I know. Some things are difficult to bring up.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I have lots of patients who would rather die than open up.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: They don't want to make trouble for people, they don't think anyone understands them, or they're just too stubborn to actually say it... You name it, I've seen it.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: But whatever the deal is, if you keep it to yourself all the way to the day you die, no one's going to know.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I'm not gonna say you've done anything wrong.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: But I need you to give it a shot.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: How I really feel? Not even I know how I really feel anymore!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Then I've gotta at least...
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Hold up!
Huh?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Gavial, wait, please.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Catch? What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: The forum is dead silent.
All the Durins are attentively listening to Avdotya tell her story.
Though her story starts off warm, it slowly deteriorates into something more sinister as it progresses.
When the story gets going, the audience holds their collective breaths, only for Avdotya to explain how she survived, sending out a collective sigh of relief.
But that's only where it starts, it's the beginning of her hardships and tribulations, and she goes through much more as she recounts the story.
When I reached the end of the cave... for a moment, I thought my eyes were deceiving me.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Had it not been a golden, shining lift, I would've mistaken it for a staircase carrying me to death.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: At that very moment, I even felt joy. I thought my hardships were coming to an end.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: I thought I could enjoy a moment of respite within death's embrace.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: I never expected that lift would open the door to a new life.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: And that was everything I went through before I made it underground.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: This is the life on the surface that I can share with you.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: It's hardly what you would call a wonderful one.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: But, looking back, it wasn't actually as hard as I remember it
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Anyway, I'm sure that the smarter ones among you already know what I'm getting at.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: It's true.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Based on our discussions, we've arrived at three possible evacuation plans.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: First, we could evacuate via the tunnels.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: According to the calculations, even if we start evacuating right now as quickly as we can, we will likely only be able to evacuate seventy percent of our population to our sibling city on the other end before the explosion.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: If that is the plan we are going with, we must start immediately, without delay.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: The second plan would require us to immediately use all our resources to excavate in the opposite direction of the tunnel. In other words, dig toward the hole on the other side and open up a safe shelter for our temporary refuge.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: As it stands, this proposal gives us a higher survival rate than the previous one, but the tunnel is our only connection to other cities.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: The disaster will destroy most of our facilities, and under those circumstances, let's not mention the issue of whether this newly-excavated shelter will be able to hold everyone in the city...
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Even if we managed to save everyone, it's questionable that we would last much longer after disaster strikes.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: As for the third proposal... It takes us to the surface.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: The industrial representative estimates that after a short extension, the lift will be able to take everyone in the city to the caves above before the explosion happens.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: The guests who arrived not too long ago are from the lands directly above Zeruertza.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: That area is a lush rainforest named Acahualla, and as their administrators, they are willing to provide all Zeruertzans living space and other assistance.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: When the crisis is over, after we settle down, we can choose to return to this place or make other arrangements.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: So far, the third proposal carries the least risk and is the most likely to keep everyone alive.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: However, we must make a decision that might just be unprecedented for the Durin peopleâ€”
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: We must head for the surface.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: That is also the reason why I told you my story.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: We still have other options available, and I don't want to influence your decision.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Allow my story to help you determine for yourselves.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Okay. Per usual, we will vote on the three proposals in ten minutes.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: I have something I need to talk to Stitch about.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Stitch, I...
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Isn't it just perfect that you're in charge of the dome?
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: You're the design representative, and everyone loves you. With you in charge of the new dome design, everyone's going to be happy with the result.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: This rivalry we've had for all these years? You've won it fair and square.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Oh, that's not what I'm here for.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: I'm here to say goodbye.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: What...?
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: You see, I've only been ACTING design representative since Master Finch left us.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: And after I took up the burden, I gradually began to think that maybe my skills weren't up to the task.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Actually, I've been thinking about leaving to look for Master Finch. I mean, he's the only one who can really be our design representative.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: And after I'm gone, as his disciple, you're the most suitable one to take the job.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: I just went back to the design department and handed my work over to the others, and I'm ready to get my things packed and leave.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: But why now?!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: I heard we're all going to the surface. I caught Avdotya's speech when I passed by the forum just now.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: I'm sure the proposal will end up passing.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: But Master Finch should be hiding out in some other Durin city. That's why, while it's still possible, I want to settle down in the one next door before I figure out my next steps.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: So, sorry, buddy. I probably won't get to help with the dome's design.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: You... You think I'd be happy about this?!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Of course not.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: But I really think you are up to the task.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: All you need is a chance to let people get to know you. Seriously.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: How dare you?!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: In his anger, Stitch raises his fist against Catch.
But it stops in its tracks midair, before falling down powerlessly.
I know Master Finch left because he wanted me to become independent.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: And I know you're doing this because you want me to give it another shot.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Gavial, too. I know all of you are doing this out of the kindness of your hearts.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Of course I know!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: But... Master Finch, you, and Gavial... Why do you have to force me down this path?!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Why can't all of you just leave me alone?!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Why can't you just let me keep hiding?!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Why do all of you have to be so kind?!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Why?!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Catch quietly picks up the design sketch next to him and hands it to Stitch.
Because you tried so hard.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: You can do much better. I know it.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Since when do you need a reason to be kind?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: And since when do you need a reason to want to keep someone from falling like that?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Now, get up.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Stop crying.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: First, you lied to my tribesmen, and now you're making trouble for all kinds of people.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: So, I'm going to sock you.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Grit your teeth. It won't hurt too bad.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Stitch looks at Gavial's fist.
In an instant, many things flash through his mind.
The joy he felt when he listened to his teacher's lectures.
The hatred he felt when his teacher left.
The disappointment he felt every time he walked out of the design department after losing a design contest.
Before he knew it, whenever he looked at the dome above him, it was anger that he felt, not excitement.
He thought the feeling was his alone and that not only could no one understand him, he did not need to be understood by anyone.
But, at this very moment, now that he's finally learned that there are those who truly want to understand him and help him...
He realizes that perhaps it is time to set that something down.
He then thinks to himself... he should take this punch.
'Bam!'
Yet, even though he was anticipating the pain, he doesn't feel a thing.
He looks down to find a deep, fist-sized pit in the table.
Hah, now you're scared?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Relax, my fist's only for the bad guys.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: You're not a bad guy. You're just a knucklehead. Why should I beat you up?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: You're the knucklehead!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Well, look at you. In such a good mood that you can still talk back, huh?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: So how about it? Wanna come along now?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Fine.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Okay, let us proceed with the voting.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: If you are voting for the first proposal, please raise your hand.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: A sparse number of hands go up around the forum.
Those with their hands up appear very calm, as though they've made up their minds, even though they know there wouldn't be many people voting for this measure.
And Avdotya knows that those who would vote for this proposal are always the ones who are willing to give their lives.
Record keeper, please record the number of votes for the first proposal.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Okay, please put your hands down.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: If you are voting for the second proposal, please raise your hand.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: This time, there are a lot of people with their hands up. Some of them even have bottles in them.
Most of them have rather sturdy builds. Undoubtedly, they are very confident in their excavation skills.
Record keeper, please record the number of votes for the second proposal.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Okay, please put your hands down.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: If you are voting for the third proposal, please raise your hand.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: The forum is dead silent.
No one has a hand up.
Avdotya knows that this outcome is only to be expected. Heading to the surface is a big decision, and her speech alone could hardly be enough to persuade them.
When she looks at the Durins whispering among themselves, she knows that her story has had no effect on them.
The Durins are not afraid. All they need is an opportunity.
They still need a push.
She also feels guilt deep in her heart.
The old her definitely would have been leading the opposition against moving to the surface.
But now she is doing other Durins' work for this.
Her guilty feelings quickly disappear, as she knows she is doing what is right.
I have a few things to add about going to the surface.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Acahualla is a humid rainforest. It is hot there, no matter the time of the year.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Even without any temperature control, we should still be able to get used to life there.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Besides, Acahualla is rich in lake water resources and is home to a natural waterfall. In other words, it's an all-natural 'Great Aquapit.'
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Furthermore, Acahualla also has a large amount of mineral resources and land. If we wish to, we can build a new city there.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Of course, we will also have the pride of Zeruertza, a new landmark that will once again put smiles on everyone's faces!
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Though we will have to discuss this with Acahualla's leader before we can make a decision.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Inam will agree to it.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Gavial?!
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Hey, Avdotya, look who I brought here.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Hm? Who is it?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: It's Stitch. I see you guys are pretty much done with that discussion. So, the dome repair's next, right?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Guess I came at just the right time?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: You came at a terrible time!
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Oh, alright. I mean, I may not be the leader of Acahualla, but let me say this on her behalf. Acahualla welcomes you all!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Get off the stage!
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Hey, I got more to say!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: No way!
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: It's true, Gavial and the surface-dwellers are all interesting.
attributes.name: Heartened Durin

attributes.content: Word. Besides, not only are they kind, they're strong, too. Making friends with them sounds like a fine idea.
attributes.name: Rational Durin

attributes.content: I think so, too! Besides, they've got a bigger 'Great Aquapit' in Acahualla! What could be better?
attributes.name: Cheerful Durin

attributes.content: But let's calm down and think it through. This is going to affect the future of the whole Durin race.
attributes.name: Rational Durin

attributes.content: I don't see anything wrong with that future though.
attributes.name: Heartened Durin

attributes.content: Right, I'm with ya. I mean, even though a lot of bad things happened on the surface in Avdotya's story, just like we've always heardâ€”
attributes.name: Cheerful Durin

attributes.content: But if all those bad things shaped Avdotya into the kind person that she is, I don't think there's anything to be afraid of.
attributes.name: Rational Durin

attributes.content: Besides, I've heard rumors that 'Stranger Things' is still running on the surface!
attributes.name: Cheerful Durin

attributes.content: Gavial, do you know how much time and effort I spent to prepare for this moment?!
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: What if they decide to stay down here because you had to butt in?!
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Hm... but I just took a look around, and all of them seem to be looking forward to it. They're gonna vote for it.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: You persuaded them already.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: How can you always be so optimistic...?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: By the way, Gavial, how is Stitch doing?
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: He says he's willing to give it a shot.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Hm? Where did he go?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I saw him in the forum. That's why I'm asking.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: And looking at him now, it looks like he's really going to do it.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: Let me give him a hand, then.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: The crowd of the forum is bubbling with talk of going to the surface.
This seems to have nothing to do with him. He should have gone inside with Gavial. He has never been comfortable with situations like this to begin with.
But he stays where he is.
He knows he isn't afraid.
He knows that there is an urge inside of him to say something.
But he has no idea how to begin.
Right, I have a piece of regrettable news I forgot to share.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: After he learned of Zeruertza's impending disaster, our design representative, Catch Lightrace, has decided to resign from his position and part ways with us for the moment.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: He's going to seek out our previous design representative, Master Finch Canvas, whose whereabouts are unknown.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: I understand and respect his decision.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: Furthermore, before he left, he appointed Master Finch's disciple, Stitch Canvas to take his position.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: And I know better than anyone that Stitch Canvas is a talented architect. Which is why I accepted this request.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: Now, let's invite him up here to say a few words.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: Stitch, the floor is yours.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: I... I'm aware you don't really know who I am... Just that my teacher is the famous Finch Canvas.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: M-My style is very different from my teacher's. His is more about resisting materialism, while mine is more leaning towardâ€”
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Sorry, that's not what I wanted to say.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: I want to talk about the proposal, the one about going to the surface.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: I know this isn't an easy decision to make.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: But I think it's the safest option available.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: And if we choose this plan, we will still have time to dress our doomed city.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: There's not much that I can do, but I'm willing to spend the last bit of time we have to come up with a plan to repair the dome.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: And, if at all possible, I want to make the dome even sturdier.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Even though it's impossible to keep an active Originium vein from exploding, that should still buy us some time.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: So please, everyone. Let's head to the surface. I'm sure my teacher... would've wanted it too.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: The audience is silent.
(Quietly) Master Edge, did I say something wrong?
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: No, you did very well. Good kid. I knew you could do it.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: Very well, then. Let's take the votes again for the third proposal.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: As though Stitch's speech has unified their opinions, the very next moment, the Durins start raising their hands one by one.
All of them are chanting something different; Stitch is unable to make it out.
But he can just barely hear some of them complimenting him.
He notices that, on a platform high up above in the distance, Catch is faintly waving to seemingly congratulate him.
It feels as though an electric current suddenly surges through him.
For the first time, he realizes just how exhilarating it feels to be acknowledged.
